FUNNY_MESSAGES.MSG_4: You lost, but you played with style! üòé

RULES.TITLE: Survivor Rules
RULES.SECTION_1_P1: Each player can choose only one team for each game round.
RULES.SECTION_1_P2: The option to make the choice public or private will be available exclusively through the app. In the current version of the game, all choices are public and visible to other participants from the moment of confirmation.
RULES.SECTION_2_TEXT: During the same tournament, it is not possible to choose the same team twice, even in different rounds.
RULES.SECTION_3_TEXT: If the chosen team loses or draws their match, the player is eliminated from the tournament.
RULES.SECTION_4_L1: only one active player remains, who is declared the winner;
RULES.SECTION_4_L2: or 10 valid game rounds are completed.
RULES.SECTION_4_P2: In case of termination due to round limit, the prize pool is divided equally among the remaining active players.
RULES.SECTION_5_P1: Choices must be made within 15 minutes before the start of the Serie A round.
RULES.SECTION_5_P2: After the start of the first match of the round, no choice can be modified.
RULES.SECTION_6_TEXT: Game rounds refer exclusively to the official Serie A calendar.
RULES.SECTION_7_TITLE: 7. Total Elimination and Prize Pool Equity
RULES.SECTION_7_P1: If, at the end of a valid round, all remaining players lose or draw, the tournament ends immediately.
RULES.SECTION_7_P2: In this case, the prize pool is divided equally among the players remaining in the game for that round.
RULES.SECTION_7_P3: The prize pool is generated exclusively by tournament participants and cannot be assigned to external or substitute players, to ensure equal conditions.
RULES.SECTION_8_P1: When the number of remaining players is equal to or less than 10% of the initial participants, active players can decide to divide the entire prize pool equally in advance.
RULES.SECTION_8_P2: The decision is made by majority vote.
RULES.SECTION_8_EXAMPLE: Tournament with 72 participants ‚Üí 10% = 7 players. If 7 or fewer players remain, it is possible to vote on the prize pool division; with a favorable majority vote, the prize pool is divided.
RULES.SECTION_8_P3: Furthermore, if the remaining players (‚â§10%) remain the same for three consecutive rounds without any elimination, the prize pool is automatically divided among them.
RULES.SECTION_9_TITLE: 9. Rounds with Postponed or Suspended Matches
RULES.SECTION_9_1_TITLE: 9.1 Postponement Before the Start of the Round
RULES.SECTION_9_1_P1: If one or more Serie A matches are postponed before the start of the round and are not played before the start of the next round (for example due to Supercoppa or extraordinary events):
RULES.SECTION_9_1_L1: the round is considered neutral for Survivor purposes;
RULES.SECTION_9_1_L2: no player is required to make a choice;
RULES.SECTION_9_1_L4: the round is not counted in the total tournament rounds;
RULES.SECTION_9_1_L5: the tournament continues regularly with the next round;
RULES.SECTION_9_1_L6: the results of postponed matches, when rescheduled, do not produce retroactive effects.
RULES.SECTION_9_2_TITLE: 9.2 Postponement or Suspension After the Start of the Round
RULES.SECTION_9_2_P1: If one or more matches are postponed or suspended after the round has started, after:
RULES.SECTION_9_2_L2: at least one match of the round has already started;
RULES.SECTION_9_2_L3: players who chose a team involved in the postponement or suspension remain active;
RULES.SECTION_9_2_L4: their choice is considered winning for tournament purposes;
RULES.SECTION_9_2_L5: the chosen team is still considered used and cannot be selected in subsequent rounds.
RULES.SECTION_9_2_P3: For all other players, the standard rules apply: the outcome of the round depends exclusively on the result of the chosen team.

DIALOGS.ABOUT_TEXT: Survivor is a competitive gaming platform where you can challenge your friends in exciting sports tournaments!
DIALOGS.ABOUT_INTRO_1: Survivor is an entertainment app dedicated to fans of Serie A, Tennis and Basketball.
DIALOGS.ABOUT_INTRO_2: Our mission is to offer fun, simple and accessible games and tournaments for everyone.
DIALOGS.ABOUT_INTRO_3: We are a small team passionate about sports and technology, and we believe in fair play and honest competition.
DIALOGS.ABOUT_NOTICE: Survivor is an entertainment game with no monetary prizes. For information on how we handle data and game rules, please refer to our
DIALOGS.ABOUT_CONTACT: For questions or support, write to us at:
DIALOGS.TERMS_1_TEXT: Survivor is a digital entertainment platform that allows users to participate in games and tournaments based on sports choices and competitive dynamics. The service does not constitute gambling or betting activities.
DIALOGS.TERMS_2_TEXT_1: To use Survivor, you must create an account via email. The user is responsible for the accuracy of the information provided and the use of their account.
DIALOGS.TERMS_2_TEXT_2: Only one account is allowed per user. Creating multiple accounts or using automated systems is prohibited.
DIALOGS.TERMS_3_TEXT: The user agrees to use Survivor correctly and in accordance with these conditions. Behaviors that could compromise the proper functioning of the platform are prohibited, including attempts to manipulate results or rankings.
DIALOGS.TERMS_4_TEXT: The rules of games and tournaments are defined within the app and may be modified at any time. Results generated by the platform are considered final and not contestable.
DIALOGS.TERMS_5_TEXT: Survivor does not provide monetary prizes. Any prizes, recognitions or trophies have exclusively symbolic or promotional value.
DIALOGS.TERMS_6_TEXT: The manager reserves the right to suspend or close a user's account, without notice, in case of violation of these conditions or improper use of the service.
DIALOGS.TERMS_7_TEXT_1: The service is provided "as is". The manager does not guarantee the absence of errors, interruptions or malfunctions and is not responsible for any damages arising from the use of the platform.
DIALOGS.TERMS_7_TEXT_2: The manager is not responsible for any inaccuracies in sports data provided by external sources.
DIALOGS.TERMS_8_TEXT: All content on Survivor, including texts, graphics, logos and platform structure, is the property of the manager and cannot be used without authorization.
DIALOGS.TERMS_9_TEXT: These Terms and Conditions may be updated or modified at any time. Changes will be effective upon their publication on the platform.
DIALOGS.TERMS_10_TEXT: These Terms and Conditions are governed by Italian law. For any dispute, the court of the place of residence or headquarters of the manager has exclusive jurisdiction.
DIALOGS.TERMS_11_TEXT: For information or requests, you can contact the manager at the email address:
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_INTRO: This Privacy Policy describes how personal data of users using the Survivor platform (hereinafter "Service") is collected, used and protected, in accordance with EU Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR).
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_1_TEXT_1: The data controller is the manager of the Survivor platform.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_1_TEXT_2: For any request regarding this Privacy Policy, you can contact the controller at the email address:
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_2_TEXT: Personal data collected through the use of the Service is limited to what is strictly necessary for its operation:
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_2_ITEM_1: Email address (used for authentication via magic link)
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_2_ITEM_4: Technical data on Service usage (logs, device and access information)
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_3_TEXT: Personal data is processed for the following purposes:
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_3_ITEM_1: Allow registration and access to the Service
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_3_ITEM_2: Enable participation in games and tournaments
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_3_ITEM_4: Ensure the security and proper functioning of the Service
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_4_TEXT: Personal data processing is carried out based on:
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_4_ITEM_1: The execution of the contract of which the user is a party (use of the Service)
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_4_ITEM_2: The legitimate interest of the controller in the security and improvement of the platform
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_5_TEXT_1: Data processing is carried out using IT and telematic tools, in compliance with the principles of lawfulness, fairness, transparency and data minimization.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_5_TEXT_2: Adequate security measures are adopted to protect personal data from unauthorized access, loss or unlawful use.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_6_TEXT_1: Personal data is retained for the time necessary to provide the Service.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_6_TEXT_2: The user can request the deletion of their account and associated data at any time.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_7_TEXT_1: Personal data is not sold or transferred to third parties.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_7_TEXT_2: Data may be processed by technical service providers (e.g. hosting or email services) exclusively for purposes related to the operation of the Service.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_8_TEXT_1: The controller may process data in aggregate and anonymous form for statistical purposes and analysis of platform usage.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_8_TEXT_2: Such data does not allow identification of users in any way.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_9_TEXT: The user has the right to:
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_9_ITEM_3: Object to or limit its processing, in cases provided by law
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_9_TEXT_2: Requests can be sent to the email address:
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_10_TEXT_1: The Service is reserved for users who have completed at least 14 years of age.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_10_TEXT_2: By registering, the user declares to meet the required age requirements.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_11_TEXT_1: The web app may use technical cookies necessary for the proper functioning of the Service.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_11_TEXT_2: Profiling cookies are not used without the user's consent.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_12_TEXT_1: This Privacy Policy may be updated at any time.
DIALOGS.PRIVACY_12_TEXT_2: Changes will be effective upon their publication on the platform.

FAQ.TITLE: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.A1: Survivor is an elimination game based on football matches. Each round you choose a team: if it wins, you stay in the game; if it loses or draws (according to the rules), you are eliminated.
FAQ.A2: To participate, you must be added to a group, accept the rules, and submit your choice within the deadline for the round.
FAQ.Q3: How do I choose the team?
FAQ.A3: You can choose a team from those playing in the available round. The choice must be made before the deadline indicated in the app.
FAQ.Q4: Can I choose the same team multiple times?
FAQ.A4: No. Each team can only be chosen once throughout the competition, unless otherwise specified in the league's specific rules.
FAQ.Q5: What happens if I forget to choose?
FAQ.A5: If you don't submit your choice within the established deadline, you will be automatically eliminated from the competition.
FAQ.Q6: When is the choice considered valid?
FAQ.A6: The choice is valid only if made correctly before the deadline and confirmed by the app.
FAQ.Q7: What happens in case of postponement or suspension of a match?
FAQ.A7: In case of postponement or suspension, the rules indicated in the official competition rules apply (e.g., match cancelled, choice to be redone, or result valid only if completed).
FAQ.A8: It depends on the competition format. In some modes a draw equals elimination, in others not. Always refer to the active rules.
FAQ.A9: Results are automatically updated in the app at the end of official matches.
FAQ.A10: Yes, you can change your choice until the round deadline. After closing, it will no longer be possible to modify it.
FAQ.Q11: What happens if multiple players win Survivor?
FAQ.A11: If multiple players remain without eliminations until the end of the calendar, the winner (or winners) is determined according to league rules (e.g., playoff, shared prize, extra round).
FAQ.A12: Any prizes depend on the league or game group. The app manages the game but is not responsible for prize management.
FAQ.A13: No. Survivor is a recreational game based on predictions, without gambling purposes.
FAQ.A14: Yes. Personal data is processed in compliance with current privacy regulations and used only for app functionality.
FAQ.Q15: Can I participate in multiple Survivors simultaneously?
FAQ.A15: Yes, you can participate in multiple competitions if enabled by the organizer.
FAQ.Q16: Who can I contact for assistance?
FAQ.A16: For technical problems or questions, use the Contact section in the app or write to
